attributes.action: Reduce the amount of homework set in schools
attributes.additional_details: Too much homework increases stress, affects mental health, and limits time for family, rest and extracurricular activities. Reducing homework would improve wellbeing and allow students to enjoy learning more.
attributes.background: We ask the Government to issue guidance to schools to reduce the amount of homework set for pupils.

rejection.details: This is not something that the UK Government or Parliament is directly responsible for. It is up to each individual school to set the homework for its students.
